transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Pawan bhai Namaste, kaise hain aap?
Executive: Bas badhiya, badhiya. Namaste ji boliye boliye.
Customer: To maine kaha ek bar call karna tha mere ko. Maine wo aapka process kara diya.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Kal uska deal ka bhi maine jo approvals vagera the wo sare maine le kar ke bhej kara kar ke kal kara diya hai.
Executive: Thik hai. Primary number to mere khyal se Parag bhai ka hi hai na?
Customer: Haan, eight food wala hai na aage.
Customer: Haan. Aur secondary wala Hiren bhai ka hai. Right? To Parag bhai ka shadi vadi se aaj tak wapas nahi aaye abhi.
Executive: Sorry? Na, wo nahi aaye abhi.
Customer: Kab tak aayenge koi idea hai?
Customer: Um, puch leta hu kyuki unka kuch family mein hai na iski wajah se nahi hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha aur Hiren bhai aa rahe hain kya office aaj kal?
Customer: Haan, wo aata hai.
Executive: Achcha to phir thik hai koi dikkat nahi hai. Actually mein kya hai na hamare end se jab bhi renew karte hain ya kuch bhi karte hain na to ek deal verification ki call jati hai. Thik hai? To wo registered number pe hi jati hai ya to primary pe jayegi ya secondary pe jayegi. Thik hai? Ab primary pe agar gayi to Parag bhai ke pass mein jayegi. To wo 80 se call jayegi wo uthayenge nahi unko pata chal jayega ki IndiaMART ka hai unko lagega ki shayad main kar raha hu to ho sakta hai mein bhi na uthaye. But agar Hiren bhai utha lenge to bhi koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Kyuki aapka number de nahi sakta hu.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi, unka number hi sure nahi hai. Hain? Hai na?
Executive: Is wajah se. Haan, to wo secondary number pe hi phir call chali jayegi to verification ki call jati hai. Usme matlab yahi deal wheel ka hai ki ye aapne services aapki renew ho rahi hai itne time ke liye. Waise most probably ho sakta hai na bhi jaye kyuki renewal hai apna. Thik hai? To renewal mein ho sakta hai na bhi jaye. Waise aapka chal to raha hai process mein to chal raha hai. Dusri chiz ye bataiye ki product abhi hamare 116 hain.
Executive: Active.
Executive: Thik hai. Thik hai aur 14 product aapke inactive mein pade hue hain Pawan bhai. Thik hai? Jisme aapke jaise 15 watt two in one semi integrated solar LED hai. Thik hai? Matlab jitne bhi hain solar wale 40 watt two in one wala ho gaya, 9 watt wala ho gaya, 24 watt hai. Ye sare solar wale hain to ye solar wale aapne hata rakhe hain. Thik hai? Iska matlab inactive kar rakha hai. Over uske alawa 50 watt LED wall glass light ho gayi ya Phoenix 150 watt LED wall glass ho gayi. Thik hai? Ye sare inactive kar rakhe hain. Inko kya abhi band kar diya hai use karna hi bilkul ya phir matlab unko khatam kar diya hai?
Customer: Actually mein haan, main wahi bata raha hu jaise ki solar lights hain. Thik hai? Usme abhi humne workout abhi baki hai usme actually. Pehle tha humne rakha tha. Aisa nahi hai. Par inka mere jo hai na usse pehle ki baat hai jab woh nahi tha na us time pe. Pata nahi kuch issue hua tha solar lights mein. To unki wajah se in logo ne discontinue kar diya tha.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Haan, to phir uska kya tha uska trading ka chalu tha. Par trading mein bhi itna koi nahi kar pa raha tha. Tabhi kya ho raha tha inquiries vagera to aati hai solar ki aapko bhi pata hai. Agar main solar chalu rakhunga to wo to solar ki obviously inquiry to chalu hi rahegi. Abhi koi maan lo ke main to chalo main janta hu ye chiz ko par mere alawa chalo mere colleague vagera hai thik hai wo portal ko nahi jante is chiz ko itna. Bas solar light ko accept kar lenge to wo to meri to buylead bigdegi na usme.
Executive: Haan haan wo to aapki phir buylead mein, main isiliye puch raha tha keval kyuki agar koi phir products vagera add karane vagera hain ya kuch aisa hai kyuki dobara se ek bar kaam hota hai na service life ke time pe hi. To iski wajah se main puch raha tha ki ek bar confirm kar lu ki kya hai inme se agar in product ko matlab active karna hoga to karwa denge. Nahi active karna hoga to jaise pada hua hai inactive mein abhi current time pe usko inactive mein hi rehne dete hain phir jab in future hame jarurat hogi to hum active kar lenge usko. Koi dikkat hi nahi hai hamare liye wo to.
Customer: Right, sahi hai ekdam. Hai na? Baki jo products vagera the aapke wo to sare aapke 116 hue rakhe hain aur jo aapne mere ko us din bhi maine aapse jaise categories vagera ka puchi thi to aapne mere ko jo jo categories boli thi wo maine add kar hi di thi. Usme koi kuch chhoda nahi tha. Jo jo aapne mere ko bola tha ki ye add kar sakte ho ya is naam se pucha jata hai to kar sakte hain hum log. To wo sara maine already kar diya tha.
Executive: Thik hai.
Executive: Baki to as such koi remaining isme kuch raha nahi hai. Thik hai? To aur kya chiz hai isme? Haan aur as such kuch nahi hai. Abhi ek bari aapki service ek bar live ho jaye phir main ek meeting bhi mere ko karna padega aapke sath mein. Thik hai sari chizo ke regarding. To wo ek bar kar ke main aapko details vagera puri batata hu kyuki wo process karna padta hai. To process karta hu phir ek bar main meeting aapse karta hu. 10 minute chahiye hoga mere ko 10-12 minute aapse. Ek bar live kara lo phir main karata hu. Hai na? Baki agar kahi koi dikkat hai to koi dikkat mere ko phone kar lena aap. Baki main jo bhi calls vagera ho uski agar recording wali uske liye registered number pe to wo main Hiren bhai pe hi karwa dunga koi dikkat nahi hai usme.
Customer: Haan aur recording wali unpe hi karwa lena.
Executive: Haan haan aapka bhi hai jo ek bar close ho jaye wo chiz. Thik hai? Baki ye rahi jo iski internally apna jo hai discussion. Thik hai? Wo apan ek bar kar lenge.
Customer: Haan haan haan, wo koi dikkat nahi. Ek bar live ho jaye phir kar lete hain uske liye na.
Customer: Haan, wo ek bar hai na thoda wo thoda abhi kya hai ki schedule ek do teen din to ye thoda mein nahi hai na to wo hamare liye bahut hai abhi.
Executive: Do teen din main bhi nahi hu kyuki kal Saturday hai, parso Sunday hamara off hai aur Monday ko bhi main available nahi rahunga because Sunday ko mere manager ki marriage hai to main aaj hi raat mein nikal raha hu Pratapgarh. To main aaunga Tuesday subah. To main sidhe Tuesday join karunga office.
Customer: Koi issue nahi hai tab tak to Parag bhai bhi shayad aa gaye honge. Thik hai main to hu available. To usme koi hai nahi itna. Ab main hum log bhi wahi main bhi wahi plan kar raha tha mere bhi thoda bahut changes to aisa nahi hai. Waise to category bhi achchi chal rahi hai par maine bola tha ki major 20 city aapne to pehle se lagai rakhi hui hai. Abhi chalo kuch thoda bahut change kar ke dekhte hain ek bar ki kaise rehti hai response.
Executive: Ek bar ek bar live ho jaye phir main aapko locations vagera nikalwa ke bhi dunga usme se aap select kar ke bata dena usme add kar.
Customer: Haan. To usme kya ek bar do teen jo location hai na jo mere ko aisa lag raha hai ki chalo waha se itna abhi nahi ho raha hai to ab main chalo update karte hain ek bar phir dekhte hain.
Executive: Kar lenge koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Haan koi dikkat nahi hai. Phir phir dekh lenge koi problem nahi hai.
Executive: Haan aur baki kya hai kuch products aisi hai iske andar ke jaise mujhe ek do teen products hai jiske photographs dalne hain naye. Products thodi kya update hui hai usme. To photograph
Executive: Mere ko WhatsApp pe hi dal dena na WhatsApp pe hi dal dena.
Customer: Haan haan but uska kya ek thoda spec vagera ye sab mere ko bana ke aapko bhejna padega actually.
Executive: Haan haan to aap aaram se bana lo phir aap share kar dena mere ko koi dikkat nahi.
Customer: Haan. To kya hai ki ek bar uska bhi thoda upgradation ho jaye iske andar aur photographs bhi naye add kar le ke jo jo naye products abhi update kare kyuki ye in logo ne maine jab aaya tab se maine jitna hua utna to maine kar liya mere hath mein tha.
Executive: Haan haan aapne to kiya hai kafi kuch kiya hai.
Customer: Haan par iske alawa kya hai mere pass abhi wo product ke photograph hi nahi hai achche wale. Abhi kuch thoda achche photos ho to dale na. Abhi wo to khiche wale to nahi dal sakte. vagera bhi nahi hua hoga.
Customer: Haan wo karwana hai wo sab chize actually. Diwali ka time tha aur wo bahut time kam tha aur abhi orders the na uska.
Executive: Koi dikkat nahi hai wo to aaram se hum karte rahenge kabhi bhi kar lenge koi dikkat nahi.
Customer: Haan isliye wo thoda hard and fast nahi tha. Abhi kya hai thoda ye sab aaram se.
Executive: Aaram se.
Customer: Haan. To wo apan kar lenge usme itna hai nahi koi. Abhi jo thoda abhi apne se jo easily jo ho ja raha hai na wo ek bar apan kar lenge. Thik hai? Baki products mein changes vagera hai na wo thoda thoda hum karte rahenge baad mein.
Executive: Haan thik hai koi dikkat nahi. Koi dikkat nahi Pawan sir. Hai na? Baki kuch hoga to main aapko update kar lunga. Hai na?
Customer: Thik hai thik hai thik hai.
Executive: Haan chalo thank you.
Customer: Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to update product photographs.

- Customer wants to activate/deactivate solar products.

- Customer wants to discuss internal matters.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to receive updated product specifications.

- Executive confirmed adding requested categories.

- Executive offered to schedule a meeting after service activation.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will schedule a meeting with the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- products, photographs, service, renewal, categories
